text: Hagi hagerimpima nemaniza nozameramimo'zane, monafima hare'za vanoma nehaza namaramimo'zane, maka zagagafamozane, maka zamasaguregati'ma rekrarohe'za vanoma nehaza zagamozane, maka ama mopafi vahe'mo'zanena Nagri navuga zamahirahiku hugahaze. Ana nehanageno agonaramimo'za ankarise'za eneramisageno, vanoma nehaza kamo'a mehi enerisigeno, keginamo'za mopafi fragu vaziramigahaze.
